title: Drawing, "Screen Design:  "Orangeade," Front Side", ca. 1984
medium: Black and yellow marking pen, crayon, graphite on white tracing paper
description: Five panel screen in yellow.  Reading from left to right:  Panel with irregular left edge, two circular "eye" cut outs, with orange spiral on upper edge; panel with semicircular cut out at right edge, center and downward sloping upper edge; pneal with semicircular cut out left edge, center (creating circle with panel to left) and saw-tooth motif at right edge, upward sloping top edge with red circles; panel with two circular "eye" cut outs and saw-toothtop edge; panel with circular cut out middle, irregular right edge, and three decorative tassels on upper edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Screen Design:  "Orangeade," Front Side", ca. 1984.
ca. 1984. Black and yellow marking pen, crayon, graphite on white tracing paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-98.
